headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GUTH, POLLY W

snippet: GUTH--Polly W. The Board and Staff of Planned Parenthood of New York City are deeply saddened by the death of our honorary board member, Polly W. Guth. Polly joined our Board in 1994 and was an ardent advocate for reproductive rights and access to education and health services. We are grateful for her extraordinary generosity, which improved the rights and health of women and girls. Polly will long be remembered for her kindness, passion for life, and commitment to this agency. We extend our heartfelt sympathies to her entire family. Katie Danziger, Chair, Board of Directors Joan Malin, President and CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: GUTH--Polly W. The Board and Staff of Planned Parenthood of New York City are deeply saddened by the death of our honorary board member, Polly W. Guth. Polly joined our Board in 1994 and was an ardent advocate for reproductive rights and access to education and health services. We are grateful for her extraordinary generosity, which improved the rights and health of women and girls. Polly will long be remembered for her kindness, passion for life, and commitment to this agency. We extend our heartfelt sympathies to her entire family. Katie Danziger, Chair, Board of Directors Joan Malin, President and CEO 1/3
